d:
Hi, this is my first attempt at an ai generated comic. I decided to make it because I noticed a lack of smalldom + yaoi comics out there and I wanted to change that, I hope you all like it :)

Due to my current work schedule I can only make about 4 pages every month, so that’s the rate I’ll try to release them in. I also have a Patreon, here’s the link.

https://patreon.com/SeroInk?utm_medium=unknown&utm_source=join_link&utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator&utm_content=copyLink

Currently the Patreon is 2 months ahead (8 more pages) I plan to post them here eventually but if you want to see them right now feel free to check out the link.
